title: Occultus Mundorum - Europa Universalis IV mod
description:
Occultus Mundorum - Europa Universalis IV mod


Extract 7zip to your C:Users[user]Documents Paradox Interactive Europa Universalis IV mod folder


Occultus Mundorum 

In a nutshell: This mod aims to transform EU IV into a fantasy empire building game. 

Occultus Mundorum started out as a simple mod that put features from different mods together where me and my friends would play multiplayer games with, but we kept adding more and more stuff and I decided it would be worth it to share it with the world! Occultus Mundorum is split in two parts; part one consists of all the base files and part two adds the new music and ambient sounds. The mod is fully compatible with version 1.7.x and all the DLC's. It does also fully function in multiplayer, as it is built for it. 
The mod is still being worked on! 

Features: 
- Early canals (adm tech 12) 
- More great works 
- New casus-belli's 
- Redone UI 
- 3 New mythical continents 
- Improved map graphics 
- New formable countries 
- New music ( part II ) 
- New ambient sounds ( part II ) 
- More ideas 
- New religions 
- Added flavour events 
- More provinces 
- More trade goods 
- More buildings 

Coming features: 
- New elven / treemen continent 
- Magic. 

Compatibility: 
This mod is incompatible with almost everything, because it changes most files, I would advise testing it out yourself if you feel the mod you are thinking of should be compatible. 

Known bugs: 
Graphical black stuff, some localisation missing.
